Uses of Class
com.here.android.mpa.customlocation.QueryBuilder

  • Packages that use QueryBuilder 
    Package Description
    com.here.android.mpa.customlocation
    This package provides classes and interfaces that support custom location searches.

    • Uses of QueryBuilder in com.here.android.mpa.customlocation

      Subclasses of QueryBuilder in com.here.android.mpa.customlocation 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CustomQueryBuilder
      An utility class to construct a query on custom attribute parameter(s), applying one or more conditions.
      Methods in com.here.android.mpa.customlocation that return QueryBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      QueryBuilder QueryBuilder.addCondition(QueryBuilder.Operation operation, QueryBuilder.Condition condition, QueryBuilder.Attribute name, java.lang.String value)
      Add a condition to the standard attribute query.
      Methods in com.here.android.mpa.customlocation with parameters of type QueryBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Request.setQuery(QueryBuilder query)
      Specifies the filter(s) to be used for a custom location request result on pre-defined attributes.
      Constructors in com.here.android.mpa.customlocation with parameters of type QueryBuilder 
      Constructor and Description
      AttributeRequest(int layerId, QueryBuilder query)
      Creates an Attribute Request with a standard attribute query.
